00002  *******************************************************
00003  *              APPLY A WINDOW FROM A BUFFER
00004  *******************************************************
00005  *              Tap.Tools Blue Object
00006  *              copyright © 2003 by Timothy A. Place
00007  *
00008  */
00009 
00010 // Check against redundant including
00011 #ifndef TT_BUFFER_WINDOW_H
00012 #define TT_BUFFER_WINDOW_H
00013 
00014 // Include appropriate headers
00015 #include "tt_audio_base.h"
00016 #include "tt_buffer.h"
00017 
00018 
00019 /********************************************************
00020         CLASS INTERFACE/IMPLEMENTATION
00021 
00022         The entire class is implemented inline for speed.
00023  ********************************************************/
00024 
00025 class tt_buffer_window:public tt_audio_base{
00026 
00027         private:
00028                 // Function pointer for the DSP Loop (use this instead of branching for speed)
00029                 typedef void (tt_buffer_window::*FuncPtr)(tt_audio_signal *, tt_audio_signal *, tt_audio_signal *);
00030                 FuncPtr dsp_executor;
00031                 
00032                 // Attribute Values
00033                 tt_attribute_value_discrete     mode;
00034                 tt_attribute_value                              gain;
00035                 tt_buffer                                               *wavetable;
00036         
00037         public:
00038                 enum selectors{                                                                         // Attribute Selectors
00039                         k_mode,
00040                         k_mode_normalized,
00041                         k_mode_normalized_fast,
00042                 };
00043                 
00044 
00045                 // OBJECT LIFE                                  
00046                 tt_buffer_window(tt_buffer *mybuffer)                           // Constructor - BUFFER ARG
00047                 {
00048                         // set defaults
00049                         set_attr(k_mode, k_mode_normalized);
00050                         wavetable = 0;
00051                         set_buffer(mybuffer);
00052                 }
00053 
00054                 ~tt_buffer_window()                                                             // Destructor
00055                 {
00056                         ;
00057                 }
00058 
00059 
00060                 // ATTRIBUTES
00061                 void set_attr(tt_selector sel, tt_attribute_value val)  // Set Attributes
00062                 {
00063                         switch (sel){
00064                                 case k_mode:    // mode sets a function pointer to the correct dsp loop
00065                                         mode = (tt_attribute_value_discrete)val;
00066                                         if(mode == k_mode_normalized)
00067                                                 dsp_executor = &tt_buffer_window::dsp_vector_calc_normalized;
00068                                         else if(mode == k_mode_normalized_fast)
00069                                                 dsp_executor = &tt_buffer_window::dsp_vector_calc_normalized_fast;
00070                                         break;
00071                         }
00072                 }
00073 
00074                 tt_attribute_value get_attr(tt_selector sel)                            // Get Attributes
00075                 {
00076                         switch (sel){
00077                                 case k_mode:
00078                                         return mode;
00079                                 default:
00080                                         return 0.0;
00081                         }
00082                 }
00083 
00084 
00085                 // METHODS
00086                 void set_buffer(tt_buffer *mybuffer)    // Set Buffer
00087                 {
00088                         wavetable = mybuffer;   
00089                 }
00090 
00091                 tt_buffer *get_buffer()                         // Get Buffer
00092                 {
00093                         return wavetable;
00094                 }
00095                 
00096 
00097                 /*****************************************************
00098                  * DSP LOOPS
00099                  *****************************************************/
00100                 
00101                 // Publically exposed interface for this object's dsp routine
00102                 void dsp_vector_calc(tt_audio_signal *in1, tt_audio_signal *in2, tt_audio_signal *out)
00103                 {
00104                         (*this.*dsp_executor)(in1, in2, out);
00105                 }
00106 
00107         private:
00108                 // DSP LOOP: input is the location from 0 to 1
00109                 void dsp_vector_calc_normalized(tt_audio_signal *in1, tt_audio_signal *in2, tt_audio_signal *out)
00110                 {
00111                         int p1, p2;
00112                         double diff;
00113                         double index;
00114                         
00115                         temp_vs = in1->vectorsize;                                              
00116                     while(temp_vs--){
00117                                 // locate the play head, range check
00118                                 index = *in1->vector++ * wavetable->length_samples;
00119                                                                 
00120                                 // table lookup (linear interpolation)  
00121                                 p1 = (int)index;
00122                                 p2 = p1 + 1;
00123                                 diff = index - p1;      
00124                                 p2 &= ((wavetable->length_samples) - 1);        // fast modulo
00125                                                                                 
00126                         *out->vector++ = *in2->vector++ * ((wavetable->contents[p2] * diff) + (wavetable->contents[p1] * (1.0 - diff)));
00127                     }
00128                     in1->reset(); in2->reset(); out->reset();
00129                 }
00130                 
00131                 // DSP LOOP: input is the location from 0 to 1, NO INTERPOLATION, NO RANGE CHECK
00132                 //      in1: index
00133                 //      in2: signal to scale
00134                 //      out: output
00135                 void dsp_vector_calc_normalized_fast(tt_audio_signal *in1, tt_audio_signal *in2, tt_audio_signal *out)
00136                 {
00137                         long index;
00138                         temp_vs = in1->vectorsize;                                              
00139                     while(temp_vs--){
00140                                 // locate the play head, range check
00141                                 index = (long int)(*in1->vector++ * wavetable->length_samples);                         
00142                         *out->vector++ = *in2->vector++ * wavetable->contents[index];
00143                     }
00144                     in1->reset(); in2->reset(); out->reset();
00145                 }
00146 };
00147 
00148 #endif  // TT_BUFFER_WINDOW_H
